data.quote: You never really understand a person until you consider things from his point of view... Until you climb inside of his skin and walk around in it.
data.author: Harper Lee

data.quote: Shoot all the blue jays you want, if you can hit 'em, but remember it's a sin to kill a mockingbird.
data.author: Harper Lee

data.quote: People in their right minds never take pride in their talents.
data.author: Harper Lee

data.quote: Open your eyes and see what you can with them before they close forever.
data.book: All the Light We Cannot See
data.author: Anthony Doerr

data.quote: It is a truth universally acknowledged, that a single man in possession of a good fortune, must be in want of a wife.
data.author: Jane Austen

data.quote: No, darling! To die it's easy... But you have to struggle for life!
data.author: Art Spiegelman

data.quote: Sometimes the eye of a hurricane is the safest place to be.
data.book: All the Light We Cannot See
data.author: Anthony Doerr
